name: Heavens Above
description:
Team Name

Divinal

Gameplay Instructions

IMPORTANT PLEASE READ!!!

***IF A MINIGAME IS TOO HARD PRESS 1 TO SKIP FIRST MINIGAME, 2 TO SKIP 2ND, 3 TO SKIP 3RD, AND 4 TO SKIP 4TH. DO **NOT** PRESS THEM OUT OF ORDER OR RISK BUGGING THE GAME. 

ALSO ONLY PRESS THE SKIP BUTTONS IF CONTROLLING THE MAIN PLAYER (SPLITSCREEN PLAYER)

PRESS 9 TO DELETE SAVE FILE AND START FROM THE BEGINNING 

Restart game if you want to leave mini game.

Beat all 4 minigames to win the game. Jump in red cloud to play incomplete minigame, jump in green cloud to replay minigames.  Main objective is to get your human friend to the end!

Main Player: A and D to move left and right. Spacebar to jump, Spacebar again to double jump.

Minigame 1: Tower Kicking Game: A to break Left column, D to break right column

Minigame 2: Flappy Angel Game: Left Mouse Button to bounce player

Minigame 3: Sidescroller Platformer Game: Spacebar to jump, Spacebar again to double jump. S key to slide under obstacles. 

Minigame 4: Ball Rolling Game: WASD for movement. Mouse control for the camera movement. 

What platform is your game built for?

Windows

List any content that was created before the jam.

Trees, Columns, Bushes, Stones, Stone, Grass Dirt Textures, Menu Buttons and Graphics, Font, Dance Animation, and all Audio

Original Content:

Player models, yellow force fields, clouds, characters and minigame blueprints. And of course all ideas and design.

Link to Gameplay Footage

Which Engine version did you use to create your entry?

5.0.3
